document.masterDocTitle: Taxonomic revision of the spider genera Agyneta and Tennesseellum (Araneae, Linyphiidae) of North America north of Mexico with a study of the embolic division within Micronetinae sensu Saaristo & Tanasevitch 1996

Microneta lophophor

, Ƥ HOLOTYPE from South Fork of Raft River ( AMNH ). Not found. NOT EXAMINED .

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 450–458.
Agyneta lophophor
(Chamberlin & Ivie 1933)
. 450–454, Male. 455–458, Female. 450. Palp, retrolateral view. 451. Variation of tip of lamella characteristica, retrolateral view. 452. Palp, prolateral view. 453. Embolus, prolateral view (arrow points to rugose extension of the embolus). 454. Radical division, retrolateral view. 455. Epigynum, ventral view. 456. Internal genitalia, ventral view. 457. Internal genitalia, dorsal view. 458. Internal genitalia, lateral view.
